about_the_game:
Would you like to add some spice (or poison) to your hero names? Equip the Zerrish Nameplate for extra slither!

The Zerrish Nameplate is a cosmetic item that highlights your hero's name.
detailed_description:
Would you like to add some spice (or poison) to your hero names? Equip the Zerrish Nameplate for extra slither!

The Zerrish Nameplate is a cosmetic item that highlights your hero's name.
legal_notice: Copyright 2020 Ronimo Games. All Rights Reserved.
name: Blightbound - Name plate skin (Viper)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K (4 * 3300) or equivalent | AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 (2048 MB) | Radeon R9 285 (2048 MB) | Mobile: GeForce GTX 1050 Mobile
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (4096 MB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Would you like to add some spice (or poison) to your hero names? Equip the Zerrish Nameplate for extra slither! The Zerrish Nameplate is a cosmetic item that highlights your hero's name.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
